title: Team Liquid: Breaking Point | A pro team's struggle with toxicity
body:
https://youtu.be/eIzGXt--Ig4

We all have bad days where we may throw some aggression to our teammates, whether it's through in-game chat, Discord, or Skype. This movie exemplifies the effects of long-term toxicity on a team's morale, attitude, and performance; and their coach's efforts to keep his team together. If you have the time, I'd definitely recommend the watch.

Note: Video contains explicit language.
